title: Bi-Weekly Career and Hiring Discussion Thread
selftext:
Hello r/india! If you need any suggestions/help regarding your career, ask here. If your company is hiring or if you are looking for a job, then post here.

**If You or Your Company is Hiring:**

1. Name of the company
2. Location
3. Requirements
4. Preferred way of contacting you

**If You are looking to get hired**

1. Your skillset/experience
2. Portfolio (if any/applicable)
3. Location
4. Preferred way of contacting you

Please do not mention your emails. You can/should prefer to take conversation forward in PMs instead to avoid any privacy mishaps.

Do follow up here with your experience. Did you get a job or hire someone successfully via these threads? Your feedback helps!

**Career Thread is posted every two weeks on Thursday mornings |** [**Old Threads**](https://reddit.com/r/india/search?q=Career+and+Hiring+thread&restrict_sr=on&sort=new&t=all)

https://preview.redd.it/osdztmrfx8n61.png?width=1487&format=png&auto=webp&s=dab56a83877ffe7dc6fd93767a8f63e9c366e592
comments:
Looking to get hired:

Semi-Qualified Cost and Management Accountant with 2 years of professional working experience, as a Finance Trainee, in the Finance Department of Indian Oil Corporation Limited and Bharat Heavy Electricals Limited.

Hands on experience with SAP FICO Module, WrenchENT Client (a DBMS tool), Ramco Systems Modules (ERP Software), and MS Office (Excel, Word and Powerpoint).

Experience of filing Income Tax Returns as a freelancer. Filed ITR-4 for approximately 50 clients in this A.Y (2022-23) and ITR 1, 2 and 3 for as per client's requirement.

Location: Delhi NCR (WFH/WFO/Full Time/Part Time)

Please let me know If you have any work opportunities related to my profile. If you have an opportunity which is not from my background, I'm open for it too. We can discuss it to see wheather I'm the right fit or not. I'm willing to go extra mile for the same. I have the desire and willingness to learn. Please consider giving me a chance. My survival depends on it. I just need one chance to turn my life around. I'll forever be indebted to you for it.

Thank you.
If you are a woman, you can considering joining a female only networking platform to get some more leads for employment.
I'm not. But thank you for your comment. ðŸ™Œ

Hiring

React native developer for a SaaS company

Recently hired from one of these threads with good results. Contact via DM or email resume to

anuj [@] goaffpro.com
# I am looking for freelancers and students for a brief editing/writing gig. Send me a DM if you are interested. Please add a brief note with your background and social media presence
I am an experience business analyst with 7+ yoe across pharma and retail domains, seeking remote opportunities for IC/team lead roles. Please DM for details.

My company is hiring.

1. Name of the company : Cloud Software Group (Formerly Tibco/Citrix)

2. Location : Pune / Hyderabad / WFH

3. Requirements : 
* Bachelors degree (Masters degree preferred) in Computer Science with 4-7 years of industry experience
* Should have good understanding of the software development life cycle
* Strong Experience in TIBCO BW 6x. EMS is must.
* Knowledge of HTTP, XML, AJAX, SOAP, Web services, SOAP UI, WSDL is required.
* Proficiency in general programming concepts & Knowledge of OOP is desired (Java, C#, C++) Passion for technology and willingness to learn 
* Knowledge of UNIX and Windows operating system is a plus
* Conceptual Knowledge of enterprise architecture integration, business process management and service-oriented architecture
* Knowledge of Databases (Preferred: Oracle, MySQL) is desired

4. Preferred way of contacting you : DM me

I work at Amazon so if you want referrals then you can pm

I am also working as a Fraud Investigator with an experience of 1+ year. Currently looking forward with new challenges. 

Critical Thinking, and Logically deducing of who is getting benefit of who is my potray. 

Looking forward for WFH.
